keyMoments.title: Vivi's Desperate Plea to Stop the War
keyMoments.description: Vivi stands between the rebel and royal armies, desperately trying to stop the civil war by calling out to Koza, but her voice is drowned out by the chaos.
keyMoments.significance: Heartbreaking moment showing Vivi's powerlessness despite her noble intentions and the tragedy of war.
keyMoments.quote: Leader! Koza! Please stop! This is all a setup!

keyMoments.title: Vivi Discovers Mr. 2's Deception
keyMoments.description: Vivi recognizes that 'Usopp' is actually Mr. 2 in disguise when he refers to Karoo as 'that bird' and shows the wrong arm for the X-mark bandage.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Vivi's intelligence and the deep bonds she's formed with the Straw Hat crew.
keyMoments.quote: The real Usopp would never call Karoo 'that bird' after all we've been through!

relationships.description: Karoo is Vivi's loyal Super Spot-Billed Duck companion who has protected her throughout her journey.

evolutionMoments.description: Karoo shields Vivi with his body from being trampled by thousands of soldiers, suffering severe injuries to protect her.

relationships.description: Koza is Vivi's childhood friend who became the leader of the rebel army.

evolutionMoments.description: Vivi desperately tries to reach Koza to stop the war, calling him 'Leader' as she did in childhood, but cannot make him hear her.

relationships.description: Vivi has formed a close bond with Usopp through their adventures together.

evolutionMoments.description: Vivi's knowledge of how Usopp treats Karoo allows her to see through Mr. 2's disguise, showing how well she knows her crewmates.

keyMoments.title: Karoo Shields Vivi from Trampling
keyMoments.description: Karoo covers Vivi with his own body and absorbs the impact of being trampled by thousands of rebel soldiers, protecting the princess at great personal risk.
keyMoments.significance: Powerful display of Karoo's unwavering loyalty and courage despite being naturally timid. One of the most touching moments showcasing his bond with Vivi.

relationships.description: Karoo is undyingly loyal to Vivi, willing to sacrifice himself to protect her.

evolutionMoments.description: Karoo demonstrates the ultimate loyalty by using his body as a shield to protect Vivi from being trampled.

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Vow to Defeat Crocodile
keyMoments.description: Despite being badly injured from fighting Crocodile, Luffy demands meat instead of medical treatment and vows to make Crocodile pay for what he did to Vivi and Toto.
keyMoments.significance: Reinforces Luffy's determination and loyalty to his friends, setting up the eventual final confrontation with Crocodile.
keyMoments.quote: I don't need a doctor, I need meat! I'm gonna make Crocodile pay for what he did to Vivi and Toto!

relationships.description: Luffy is deeply committed to helping Vivi save her country and defeat Crocodile.

evolutionMoments.description: Even while severely injured, Luffy vows to defeat Crocodile for hurting Vivi and her people.

name.japanese: Mr.2・ボン・クレー (ベンサム)

keyMoments.title: Defeats Usopp and Matsuge
keyMoments.description: Mr. 2 Bon Clay easily defeats Usopp and Matsuge in an off-screen battle, demonstrating his combat superiority.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Mr. 2's strength and sets up his infiltration plan using his shape-shifting powers.

keyMoments.title: Disguises as Usopp to Deceive Vivi
keyMoments.description: Mr. 2 uses his Mane Mane no Mi powers to transform into Usopp and approach Vivi on horseback, attempting to prevent her from stopping the rebel attack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Mr. 2's Devil Fruit ability in a tactical infiltration attempt.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Baroque Works' Intelligence
keyMoments.description: After being exposed by Vivi, Mr. 2 reveals that Crocodile informed all elite Baroque Works agents about the Straw Hats' arm bandage system.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the depth of Crocodile's intelligence network and strategic preparation.
keyMoments.quote: Crocodile told all of us elite members that you Straw Hats had bandages on your arms!

abilities.description: Can perfectly copy the appearance and voice of anyone he has touched with his right hand.

keyMoments.title: Devises X-Mark Identity System
keyMoments.description: Zoro establishes the crew's X-mark beneath bandages system to verify identities against Mr. 2's shapeshifting abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Zoro's strategic thinking and creates a symbol that will become iconic in the arc's emotional climax.
keyMoments.quote: This X mark is proof of our fellowship. Mr. 2 won't be able to copy this!

keyMoments.title: Confronts Mr. 1 and Miss Doublefinger with Nami
keyMoments.description: Zoro and Nami face Mr. 1 (Daz Bonez) and Miss Doublefinger as part of the decoy plan.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Zoro's toughest battle yet against an opponent whose body is as hard as steel.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Mr. 2 Bon Clay
keyMoments.description: Usopp and Matsuge are easily defeated by Mr. 2 in an off-screen battle, getting knocked unconscious.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the power gap between Usopp and the Baroque Works officer agents, setting up Mr. 2's infiltration attempt.

relationships.description: Usopp has formed a bond with Karoo through their adventures.

evolutionMoments.description: Vivi's knowledge that the real Usopp would never call Karoo 'that bird' reveals the respect and friendship between them.

keyMoments.title: Cannot Hear Vivi's Plea
keyMoments.description: Koza leads the rebel army toward Alubarna. Vivi calls out to him using his childhood title 'Leader,' but he cannot hear her through the chaos.
keyMoments.significance: Tragic moment showing how miscommunication and the chaos of war prevent reconciliation between childhood friends.

relationships.description: Koza and Vivi were childhood friends, with Vivi calling him 'Leader' when they were young.

evolutionMoments.description: The tragic inability to communicate as Vivi desperately calls out to Koza, but he cannot hear her over the chaos of the approaching battle.

keyMoments.title: Tries to Get Luffy Medical Treatment
keyMoments.description: Pell urges Luffy to seek medical treatment for his serious injuries from fighting Crocodile, but Luffy refuses and demands meat instead.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Pell's concern for Luffy and sets up Luffy's characteristic stubbornness.
